projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive hospital management system with 50+ modules including patient management, appointment scheduling, billing, and inventory.
projects.longDescription: Built a complete Hospital Management System using Odoo framework with custom modules for patient management, appointment scheduling, billing, pharmacy, laboratory, and inventory management. The system streamlines hospital operations and improves patient care.

projects.title: Car Repair Management System
projects.description: An end-to-end solution for managing car repair workshops, including service tracking, parts inventory, and customer management.
projects.longDescription: Developed a Car Repair Management System that helps workshops manage their daily operations efficiently. Features include service tracking, parts inventory, customer management, and automated billing.

projects.title: Multi-Vendor E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A feature-rich multi-vendor marketplace platform built with modern e-commerce capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Created a sophisticated multi-vendor e-commerce platform that enables multiple sellers to manage their stores, products, and orders. Includes features like automated vendor payouts, commission management, and advanced analytics.

projects.title: Odoo Projects Collection
projects.description: A portfolio of various Odoo ERP implementations and custom module developments.
projects.longDescription: Collection of multiple Odoo projects showcasing expertise in ERP customization, module development, and business process automation across different industries.

projects.title: Shopify Development Portfolio
projects.description: Collection of custom Shopify store developments and theme customizations.
projects.longDescription: Portfolio of Shopify projects including custom theme development, app integrations, and store optimizations for various e-commerce businesses.

projects.title: WordPress Development Portfolio
projects.description: Showcase of WordPress websites, custom plugins, and theme developments.
projects.longDescription: Collection of WordPress projects demonstrating expertise in custom theme development, plugin creation, and website optimization.

projects.title: Recipe Sharing Platform
projects.description: A community-driven recipe sharing and meal planning platform

projects.title: Virtual Event Platform
projects.description: A platform for hosting and managing virtual events
